articles.summary: USA TODAY: What's open and closed on Christmas Day 2025? Here's what to know. Here's what to know about which restaurants, grocery stores and retail stores will be open and closed on Christmas Day this eyar.

articles.title: JPMorgan Mulls Entering Crypto Trading Business: What Does This Mean?
articles.mainIdea: JPMorgan Mulls Entering Crypto Trading Business: What Does This Mean?
articles.summary: Zacks: JPMorgan Mulls Entering Crypto Trading Business: What Does This Mean?. JPM is weighing crypto trading for institutions as regulation eases, signaling a shift that could add liquidity and intensify competition. Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, JPM, MS, MS-PQ.

articles.title: PNC adds tech from Extend to support virtual cards
articles.mainIdea: PNC adds tech from Extend to support virtual cards
articles.summary: American Banker: PNC adds tech from Extend to support virtual cards. The bank is betting on demand from resource-challenged companies.
